Ingredients.5: 2 (12 fluid ounce) cans frozen orange juice concentrate

Ingredients.6: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate

Directions.1: In a blender, combine bananas, sugar, and 3 cups water. Blend until smooth. Pour into a large bowl and stir in pineapple juice. Blend in orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate, and 3 cups water. Divide into 3 plastic containers and freeze until solid, 4 hours to overnight.

Directions.2: Remove from freezer 3 to 4 hours before serving. Using one portion at a time, place slush in a punch bowl and pour in 1 liter of ginger ale for each.
